title: Camila Cabello shows off her toned tummy in crop top and leggings combo
text:
Earlier this month she stunned in red PVC while promoting her new solo album Romance in the UK.

But on Tuesday, Camila Cabello was back Stateside, leaving a West Hollywood gym while wearing comfy workout gear.

The Señorita songstress flashed her toned tummy in a flattering leggings and sports bra combo.

Sweat session: On Tuesday, Camila Cabello was back Stateside, leaving a West Hollywood gym while wearing comfy workout gear

The 22-year-old covered her bare shoulders with a black hoodie, and shielded her eyes with tortoiseshell shades.

On her feet she wore a pair of black Nike sneakers as she strolled with two male friends, away from Dogpound gym.

Cabello has been dating Canadian crooner Shawn Mendes since July 4, 2019.

Abs-olutely fabulous: The Señorita songstress flashed her toned tummy in a flattering leggings and sports bra combo

Covered up: The 22-year-old covered her bare shoulders with a black hoodie, and shielded her eyes with tortoiseshell shades

Well-heeled: On her feet she wore a pair of black Nike sneakers as she strolled with two male friends, away from Dogpound gym

On Tuesday, the Havana hitmaker visited the same gym with mom Sinuhe Estrabao.

The Fifth Harmony alum showcased her gorgeous gams in three quarter length leggings, worn with Nike sneakers and a heavy wool hoodie.

The Cuban-born beauty shielded her eyes with dark shades and her wavy raven tresses were pulled back in a pony tail.

Camila went makeup free for the sweat session and sipped coconut water as she made her way to her car.

Quality time: On Tuesday, the Havana hitmaker visited the same gym with mom Sinuhe Estrabao

Legs for daze: The Fifth Harmony alum showcased her gorgeous gams in three quarter length leggings, worn with Nike sneakers and a heavy wool hoodie

The look was a far cry from the one she sported on The Graham Norton Show on Friday.

She teamed a very sexy red PVC corset with matching form-fitting trousers and even chose to wear gloves and a choker in the same material.

After singing her song, Camila then headed over to the famous sofa to talk to Graham about her new album.

Back to basics: The Cuban-born beauty shielded her eyes with dark shades and her wavy raven tresses were pulled back in a pony tail

She greeted fellow guest Emilia Clarke, shouting out: 'My queen!' and presenting her with a tiny dragon gift.

Camila said: 'I am the biggest Game of Thrones fan in the entire world. I am just freaking out to meet you guys.

'I literally went through all eight seasons in a month this year.'

Camila was in London earlier this month to promote her upcoming album, Romance.
description: On Tuesday, Camila Cabello was back Stateside, leaving a West Hollywood gym while wearing comfy workout gear.
